body_html:
The last 2 were just added to documentation (we've had them for a couple of
months). Look at the source code of GridLSTMCell and its init to see
how it works.

Working on getting performance benchmarks into the code.

On Mon, Aug 1, 2016 at 6:52 AM, LeavesBreathe notifications@github.com
wrote:

It looks like there are also options for gridlstm and more:

+### Fused RNNCells
+@@LSTMFusedCell
+
+### LSTM-like cells
+@@CoupledInputForgetGateLSTMCell
+@@TimeFreqLSTMCell
+@@GridLSTMCell

if I understand it correctly, would we call:

cell = tf.rnn_cell.GridLSTM(size)

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

body:
The last 2 were just added to documentation (we've had them for a couple of
months).  Look at the source code of GridLSTMCell  and its **init** to see
how it works.

Working on getting performance benchmarks into the code.

On Mon, Aug 1, 2016 at 6:52 AM, LeavesBreathe notifications@github.com
wrote:

> It looks like there are also options for gridlstm and more:
> 
> +### Fused RNNCells
> +@@LSTMFusedCell
> +
> +### LSTM-like cells
> +@@CoupledInputForgetGateLSTMCell
> +@@TimeFreqLSTMCell
> +@@GridLSTMCell
> 
> if I understand it correctly, would we call:
> 
> cell = tf.rnn_cell.GridLSTM(size)
>
